dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4626 IH: SAFE Act Confidentiality and Privilege Enhancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Capito introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To ensure access to certain information for financial services industry regulators, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SAFE Act Confidentiality and Privilege Enhancement Act.

section.header: Confidentiality of information shared between state and federal financial services regulators
section.text: Section 1512(a) of the S.A.F.E. Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 (12 U.S.C. 5111(a)) is amended by inserting or financial services before industry.
